RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 17400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 11, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pri ce $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MASTEROFTHEHOUNDS prompted the early pace three wide, made the lead entering the turn, set the balance of the pace and drew off through deep stretch under strong handling to win as much the best. POWERFUL PHIL settled just behind the leaders two wide, moved up three then two wide through the turn and finished second best in the five path. SPIN DOCTOR never far back, finished with good courage in the six path. HOPPY GILMORE settled close up along the inside, advanced two wide into the stretch then finished evenly. ATTACK ANGLE failed to menace. THE MAN CAN pressed the early pace two wide, led briefly nearing the turn, kept pressured along the rail into the stretch then came up empty. WEEKEND BUZZ was outrun. FOREIGN sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace down the backstretch, checked entering the turn then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Foreign
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead rail, checked 3/8 pole, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Hoppy Gilmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, inside, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Weekend Buzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: The Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led briefly, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Phil
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, second best 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Attack Angle
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Spin Doctor
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Masterofthehounds
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3w, took over 3/8pole, drew off, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: W. John Bourke & Lowell F. Allen

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 79. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 25600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAT THE DEALER never far back, closed willingly three wide through upper stretch to make the lead before the furlong marker and proved best under strong handling while fully extended. DR. ZARNETT pressed the pace two wide and gamely gained second. SPEEDY MOBILE set a pressured pace along the inside until mid stretch then was outfinished. ROSCO P. COLTRANE stalked the early pace, swung wide entering the stretch and gave way. CHOCOLATE PHILLING trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 3 wide, fully extended,

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Philling
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosco P. Coltrane
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, swung wide, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Zarnett
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gamely gained second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 36. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUESS AGAIN stalked the pace through the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead in upper stretch, was put to left handed urging in mid stretch and just lasted under a strong hand ride. SEEKING FREEDOM never far back, closed willingly four wide through deep stretch and just missed getting up in time. VECCHI advanced steadily along the inside to gain a narrow lead before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the stretch then was outfinished. AFTER SUNRISE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and was outfinished. ONE STEP ASIDE improved position outside on the turn, angled into the four path in upper stretch then finished evenly. LIVING THE DREAM was no factor. STRIKING LAD six wide early, failed to respond. RIVERS OF DENIRO had brief speed. DREAMINGABOUTTIME was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Living the Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Dreamingabouttime
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Vecchi
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: After Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers of Deniro
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Guess Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, late lead, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking Freedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Aside
ENTRY.COMMENT: improved position outside turn, angled in upper stretch, leveled

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6 wide, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since September 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since August 11 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming R aces For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOT MARIE unhurried early, closed willingly three wide through the far turn, made the lead two wide past the furlong marker under left handed urging and drew off in the six path. TYRONA pressed the pace two wide around the clubhouse turn, assumed command, opened a daylight lead on the far turn, maintained the advantage until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. ALSANAH slow early, swung wide and closed a gap late in the seven path. ZIP CODE ENVY settled in the four path down the backstretch, bid along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN close up for six furlongs, weakened. DATTTSAFANCYFOX set the pace along the inside around the first turn and stopped after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Yacht Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace, stopped after half

ENTRY.NAME: Tyrona
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, drew off 2nd turn, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Zip Code Envy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4path backstretch, inside bid, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung wide, late gain mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Dot Marie
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed willingly 3 wide, late lead, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KISS ME QUICK vied for the lead three wide into the stretch, responded with a burst of speed under left handed urging to make the lead inside the sixteenth pole and drew clear. SALTMAKESHERSWEET broke in front, set the pace until deep stretch then was no match for the winner. COMPUTE THIS pressed the pace along the rail and faded in the stretch. CURLIN PEARLS failed to menace. FLAME FOR REAL had brief speed. SNOWBIRD trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Compute This
ENTRY.OWNER: Sheppell Peter J and Royer Family Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Flame for Real
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Curlin Pearls
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Snowbird
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Me Quick
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, late burst, left handed urging, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Saltmakeshersweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 30800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIONISTIC away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while being ridden out. AUJARA stalked the pace into the stretch, had a mild late rally in the five path and finished clear for second. LEXY ANNA pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then weakened. PANAMANIAC failed to menace. STATUS SYMBOL hopped hitting the gate at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Panamaniac
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Lionistic
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Aujara
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, mild rally 5path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Status Symbol
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, hit gate start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Lexy Anna
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 11, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 11 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since August 11 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE BIRD FLASH trailed into the stretch, closed willingly three wide under confident handling and was along in time. KAY BEE GEE pressed the pace two wide to the top of the stretch, made the lead, set the pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. ADULTING stalked the pace two wide then along the inside into the stretch, shifted two wide around the early pacesetter in upper stretch and faded late. LADY LEAH away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside to the top of the stretch then folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Leah
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace top lane, folded

ENTRY.NAME: Little Bird Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 3 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Adulting
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, 2-wide, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Kay Bee Gee
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARSH TRUTH broke slowly, circled his field six wide through deep stretch and was along in time in time. SHOWTIME BOY never far back, rallied through deep stretch five wide and got up for second. IPPOLITO'S WONDER stalked pace the pace through the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead in upper stretch then was outfinished. MILAGRO DE JOVANNI pressed the pace along the inside, was bumped entering the stretch then faded late. EL SORDO never far back, moved up along the inside through the turn, shifted out three wide then failed to sustain that bid. ROUGE TU RICHES away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch, bumped with MILAGRO DE JOVANNI then tired late.

ENTRY.NAME: El Sordo
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Milagro de Jovanni
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, bumped upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Harsh Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, circled field, 6 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Showtime Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 5 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Rouge Tu Riches
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, bumped top lane, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ippolito's Wonder
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, led lane, outfinished
